name: Hero Shoot Zombie Adventure
description:
Hero Shoot Zombie Adventure is one of the best adventure, action zombie run game, zombie attack is a adventure run game with shooting. Run and destroy as many zombies you can. You can even get truck, jeep and car while running to kill zombies as power ups. Even some plants are changed to zombies, just jump above them, it cannot be destroyed.
How to play
* Tap left of screen for jump
* Double tap for jump high
* Tap right of screen for shoot
* Run and kill all zombies which attacks you.
